sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Pdf from "react-to-pdf"; const ref=React.createRef() const PDF=(props)=>{ return( <>


    Office of Tahsildar
    Reference- 1) Applicant of shri/smt.Asad Ali Muqqadar Ali , Income Certificate Issued by Tahsildar / Nayab Tahsildar Amalner,
    Dist Jalgaon,Register no. 39691012140.Dated:- 24/07/2021. Place- Amalner ,Dist Jalgaon.
    Income Certificate

    This is to certified that the income of Shri/Smt. Asad Ali Muqqaddar Ali Resident of Village Amalner,
    Tal Amalner , Dist Jalgaon The total income of last 3 years received by the applicant and his family in all ways and
    means on the basis of their Talathi report is as follows:

    Applicant Income of 37,000/- (In Words Thirty Seven Thousand Only ) Not A Greater Than.
    Proof of this. Asad Ali Muqqaddar Ali is being paid for Education And government Technical Benefit
    For Son/Daughter /Family Pension Purpose only, as well This is being done on the basis of the documents
    submitted to the office. This certificate will be valid till March 31, 2023.

    Documents Verified- 1) Adhar card. 2) Ration card 3) Talathi income certificate

    No/MAG/Sr/ /2021 Place:- Amalner. Date:- 24 /07/2021 seal of office Nayab Tahsildar Amalner Year Annual Income Words (Rupees) 2018-2019 35,000 Thirty Five Thousand Only 2019-2020 36,000 Thirty Six Thousand Only 2020-2021 37,000 Thirty Seven Thousand Only
{({ toPdf })=>}
) } export default PDF;
